description: Behold, BD Forged Denim—the next step in climbing denim’s evolution. Our denim is built using the exclusive BD.Forged design protocol to fully embody the Black Diamond apparel point of difference. Focused for climbing, this pant is burly, thanks to its Cordura™ fiber content, yet unbelievably stretchy for moving over stone. Featuring their slim and tapered V11 fit, be prepared to slip into a pair and never want to take them off … at least not for climbing.
name: Black Diamond Forged Denim Pants, 30" Inseam - Mens
